snippet: A British study has found that paying drug addicts was effective in getting them vaccinated against hepatitis B.
abstract: Study published in journal The Lancet finds that paying heroin addicts in Great Britain equivalent of $50 each to have series of three injections in a month was very effective in getting them fully vaccinated against hepatitis B; nearly quarter of Britain's addicts have hepatitis B.
lead_paragraph: A British study has found that paying drug addicts was effective in getting them vaccinated against hepatitis B.

headline.main: It Pays to Pay Addicts to Get Vaccinations
